## ResourceJson.Normalized.IImporterResourceDecl type

Normalized non-validated declaration of a resource for import, which can be either a loose or child resource.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type IImporterResourceDecl = ILooseResourceDecl | IChildResourceDecl;
```
